actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the construction of the William B. Hoyt II Visitor Center at Mount Morris Dam in Mount Morris, New York.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Army to construct a visitor center at Mount Morris Dam in Mount Morris, New York. Designates such visitor center as the William B. Hoyt Visitor Center. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the construction of the William B. Hoyt II Visitor Center at Mount Morris Dam in Mount Morris, New York.
